attributes.action: Current England squad to play a team of England legends at Wembley this year
attributes.additional_details: This will give supporters a chance to thank the boys for their efforts in Russia and show some love for the team. All proceeds from ticket sales will go to the NHS in support of the great work of our doctors and nurses
attributes.background: The success of the England team out in Russia during this World Cup has brought a divided nation together these last few weeks. As a way of saying thanks to Gareth Southgate and the England boys I propose a match at Wembley where the current England squad will face an England legends side
